company_profile.name: Shopmetrics Europe Ltd.
company_profile.description: We provide an enterprise-class SaaS platform for mystery shopping, fieldwork, and market research providers worldwide. Our mission is to help clients improve business performance through service excellence using real-time, accurate data collection and AI-powered analytics. Our focus areas include Digital Transformation, CX (Customer Experience) Excellence, and automated fieldwork management.

company_summary.profile_overview: Shopmetrics Europe Ltd. is a Other based in Bulgaria with 47 employees and expertise in Customer Experience (CX) Software, Market Research Analytics, Service Excellence Consulting.

overall_assessment.summary_text: Found 19 funding opportunities matching the company profile. 2 high-priority opportunities identified.
overall_assessment.strategic_advice: Focus on high-priority opportunities (80%+ match) first. Prepare applications well before deadlines. Consider forming consortiums for larger projects.

funding_cards.title: Future-proofing sustainable cultural tourism

project_summary.company_fit_assessment: Match score: 8.0/10 - Eligible opportunity. Strong domain alignment in Customer Experience (CX) Software.
project_summary.recommendation: Priority: high. Review details and assess fit.

funding_cards.why_recommended: Match score: 8.0/10 - Eligible opportunity. Strong domain alignment in Customer Experience (CX) Software.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Evidence-based solutions for integrating cultural tourism into strategies for regenerative sustainability
domain_matches.reasoning: The company's software can be adapted to measure visitor satisfaction and sentiment, providing the 'evidence' needed for sustainable tourism policy recommendations.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Analytical framework for ethical AI integration and AI-assisted foresight
domain_matches.reasoning: Expertise in analytics is directly applicable to creating the foresight tools and ethical AI frameworks requested in Focus 1.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Improving workforce numbers, skills, and working conditions
domain_matches.reasoning: Consulting experience can help design the 'Service Excellence' standards for tourism workforces in emerging destinations.

suggested_partners: Universities with Cultural Heritage or Sustainable Tourism departments (to lead the theoretical framework and policy co-creation).
Regional Tourism Boards or DMOs (Destination Management Organizations) from 'less-developed destinations' to provide pilot sites.
NGOs focused on Social Inclusion and Gender Equality to address the specific societal requirements of the call.

funding_cards.title: AI-powered foodome characterization

project_summary.recommendation: Priority: medium. Review details and assess fit.

domain_matches.call_requirement: AI tool for data analysis and quantification
domain_matches.reasoning: The company's expertise in handling complex datasets can be adapted to the algorithmic requirements, though the data type (biochemical vs. consumer) differs significantly.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Improving capacity and synergies between industry and research
domain_matches.reasoning: Shopmetrics could potentially develop the user interface or dashboard for the AI tool, but this is a peripheral requirement of the call.

suggested_partners: University Research Labs specializing in Metabolomics or Food Chemistry
Bioinformatics SMEs with experience in mass spectrometry data
Large-scale Food Manufacturers (to provide sample data and validation environments)

funding_cards.title: Automated Scientific Discovery – Food (RAISE pilot)

project_summary.recommendation: Priority: medium. Review details and assess fit.

domain_matches.call_requirement: AI-driven decision-making processes and robust data infrastructures
domain_matches.reasoning: Shopmetrics' expertise in processing complex datasets can be adapted to the 'intelligence layer' required for analyzing experimental data.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Scalable and secure data storage solutions and analysis tools
domain_matches.reasoning: While the company builds scalable software, the call requires integration with physical laboratory instrumentation which is not a core competency.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Development of best practices, challenges, and opportunities for accelerating R&D
domain_matches.reasoning: Consulting skills could support the 'best practices' outcome, but the context is scientific R&D rather than service delivery.

suggested_partners: Food Science Research Institutes (e.g., Wageningen University or INRAE) to provide the laboratory environment.
Robotics and Laboratory Automation hardware providers to handle the physical closed-loop integration.
AI Ethics and Security specialists to address the 'trustworthy' and 'security by design' requirements.

domain_matches.reasoning: Shopmetrics can process complex socio-economic data to complement environmental observations, providing the 'Earth Intelligence' insights required for decision-making.

domain_matches.call_requirement: User-tailored, co-design approach for downstream applications
domain_matches.reasoning: The company's expertise in building user-centric dashboards and feedback loops is essential for creating the 'fit-for-purpose' information tools requested.

funding_cards.title: EU-SME Centre in China

funding_cards.why_recommended: Match score: 6.6/10 - Eligible opportunity. Strong domain alignment in Market Research Analytics.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Updated and new publications focusing on specific segments of the Chinese market
domain_matches.reasoning: The company's expertise in analytics can be leveraged to produce the data-driven market reports and segment analysis required by the call.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Number of SMEs satisfied with the services provided (post-service customer evaluations)
domain_matches.reasoning: Shopmetrics can provide the technical infrastructure to track, measure, and report on the satisfaction KPIs mandated by the European Commission.

domain_matches.reasoning: The company can contribute to the 'fitness and readiness' assessment of SMEs, though they may lack specific legal/regulatory expertise for the Chinese market.

funding_cards.title: Open topic on preventing and countering the misuse of emerging technologies for criminal purposes, including issues related to lawful access to data

project_summary.recommendation: Priority: medium. Review details and assess fit.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Efficient data access and investigation of criminal offences
domain_matches.reasoning: The company's expertise in processing complex datasets can be pivoted toward developing analytical tools for Police Authorities to detect patterns in emerging technology misuse.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Modern, accessible and validated tools for Police Authorities
domain_matches.reasoning: While the software is 'accessible,' the functional requirements for law enforcement (security, forensics) differ vastly from commercial CX metrics.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Sharing of best practices and interdisciplinary collaboration
domain_matches.reasoning: Consulting skills could assist in the 'training curricula' and 'best practices' outcomes, though the subject matter expertise in crime prevention is currently missing.

suggested_partners: Law Enforcement Agencies (LEAs) such as Europol or national police forces to provide the end-user requirements and validation.
Cybersecurity Research Institutes specializing in generative AI or quantum-resistant encryption to address the 'emerging technology' scope.
Legal and Ethical Experts (NGOs or Law Faculties) to ensure compliance with fundamental rights and personal data protection.

funding_cards.title: Thematic Networks of Excellence for AI in Science – Agriculture and Environmental Pollution (RAISE pilot)

project_summary.recommendation: Priority: medium. Review details and assess fit.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Social Sciences and Humanities (SSH) expertise
domain_matches.reasoning: The company's expertise in data-driven insights could support the SSH component of the call, though the call prioritizes scientific AI over commercial analytics.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Innovative AI solutions for scientific research
domain_matches.reasoning: There is a significant gap between commercial CX software development and the high-level scientific AI modeling required for environmental pollution and agriculture.

suggested_partners: University Research Labs specializing in Agronomy or Environmental Science (e.g., Wageningen University or INRAE).
AI Research Institutes focused on Deep Learning and Scientific Computing (e.g., DFKI or INRIA).

funding_cards.title: Boosting data availability and AI solutions in food for consumers and food service professionals

project_summary.company_fit_assessment: Match score: 6.3/10 - Eligible opportunity. Strong domain alignment in Market Research Analytics.
project_summary.recommendation: Priority: medium. Review details and assess fit.

funding_cards.why_recommended: Match score: 6.3/10 - Eligible opportunity. Strong domain alignment in Market Research Analytics.

domain_matches.call_requirement: High value and high quality digital datasets for food products
domain_matches.reasoning: Shopmetrics' expertise in processing complex consumer data aligns perfectly with the need to develop high-quality datasets for food service applications.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Human-centric, generative AI solutions for consumers
domain_matches.reasoning: The company can leverage its CX platform experience to design the user interface and feedback loops for the required AI solutions, though it lacks specific food-sector AI models.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Improve productivity and sustainability of food service professionals
domain_matches.reasoning: Consulting expertise can be applied to optimize food service workflows, though the focus must shift from general service to sustainability and dietary health.

suggested_partners: Agritech or Food-Tech Research Institutes (e.g., Wageningen University) to provide domain expertise in dietary health and sustainability metrics.
Generative AI specialized SMEs to lead the development of the large language models (LLMs) specifically for food preparation and preservation.
European Digital Innovation Hubs (EDIHs) to facilitate the required SME support packages and market uptake.

funding_cards.title: Integrating a holistic perspective in microbiome research for resilient, competitive and sustainable food systems

project_summary.recommendation: Priority: medium. Review details and assess fit.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Integrated analysis of microbiome (meta)-data and FAIR principles
domain_matches.reasoning: The company's expertise in complex data analytics could be pivoted toward managing and visualizing large-scale microbiome datasets or stakeholder feedback loops.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Digital transition and AI Act compliance
domain_matches.reasoning: While the company has software expertise, the call requires deep biological systems modeling rather than consumer-facing experience platforms.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Trans-disciplinary collaboration among different stakeholders
domain_matches.reasoning: The company could potentially facilitate stakeholder engagement or impact assessment, though this is not a core technical requirement of the call.

suggested_partners: Microbiology Research Institutes (to lead the biological and One Health research components)
Bioinformatics SMEs (to bridge the gap between Shopmetrics' data tools and biological meta-data)
Agrifood Industry Clusters (to provide the 'food systems' environment for software application)

funding_cards.title: Approaches and tools for security in software and hardware development and assessment

project_summary.recommendation: Priority: medium. Review details and assess fit.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Integrated security-by-design approaches in software development
domain_matches.reasoning: While the company develops software, their expertise is in application-level CX analytics rather than the systems-level security frameworks required by the call.

domain_matches.call_requirement: Standardised methodologies for hardware security assessment
domain_matches.reasoning: The company's consulting focus is on business service quality, which does not align with the technical cybersecurity certification and hardware assessment methodologies requested.

suggested_partners: Semiconductor manufacturers or fabless chip design companies (e.g., Nordic Semiconductor, STMicroelectronics) to lead the hardware workstream.
Cybersecurity research institutes (e.g., Fraunhofer AISEC) to provide formal verification and security testing methodologies.
Cloud infrastructure providers to validate edge-to-cloud security architectures.
